origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'FinanceJobBoard.get_job_requirements', 'description': 'Get the job requirements for a specific industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry to search for job requirements.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'requirements', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing job requirements for the specified industry.'}]}, {'name': 'FinanceJobBoard.get_salary_info', 'description': 'Get salary information for different positions in an industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry to search for salary information.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'salaries', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing salary information for different positions in the specified industry.'}]}, {'name': 'FinanceJobBoard.search_job_listings', 'description': 'Search for job listings in a specific industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry to search for job listings.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'listings', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing job listings for the specified industry.'}]}, {'name': 'FinanceJobBoard.get_industry_advice', 'description': 'Get career advice from industry professionals.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry to get career advice for.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'advice', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing career advice from professionals in the specified industry.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
了解互联网金融行业的岗位需求和技能要求。接下来，查询不同岗位的薪资待遇水平。然后，获取互联网金融企业的招聘信息。最后，咨询业内人士关于职业发展规划的建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
了解互联网金融行业的岗位需求和技能要求。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'industry'的值是什么?
